Introduction

Lucas is a Chinese-Thai singer and rapper under SM Entertainment. He is a member of the supergroup SuperM and a former member of NCT and It's sub-units NCT U and WayV. He was also one-half of WayV's pre-debut subunit duo WayV-LUCAS&HENDERY.

He made his solo debut with the single album "Renegade" on April 1st, 2024.

In 2015, he was cast into SM Entertainment through SM’s Global Audition in Hong Kong. On April 5, 2017, he was introduced as a member of SM's pre-debut training team, SMROOKIES, and in the same month, he appeared in NCT member Ten’s "Dream In A Dream" music video.

In January 2018, Him alongside Kun, and Jungwoo were announced to become NCT member, through the NCT 2018 Yearbook. On February 18, 2018, he officially debuted as a member of NCT, in the unit NCT U, with the song "Boss". On March 14, 2018, he took in the NCT's first studio album 'NCT 2018 Empathy'.

On December 31, 2018, it was revealed that he was a member of NCT's Chinese sub-unit, WayV which debuted on January 17, 2019, with the digital EP, 'The Vision'.

On August 8, 2019, it was announced that Lucas would be a member of the supergroup SuperM. They released their self-titled debut mini-album on October 4, 2019. On November 18, 2019, they released the promotional single "Let's Go Everywhere".

On May 10, 2023, SM Entertainment announced that Lucas would leave NCT and WayV and would begin his solo activities.
